task_question: What is known about transmission, incubation, and environmental stability?
task_des: What do we know about COVID-19 risk factors? What have we learned from epidemiological studies?

sub_task.original_text: Data on potential risks factors, Smoking, pre-existing pulmonary disease
questions: Is smoking a risk factor for COVID-19?
is pre-existing pulmonary disease a risk factor for COVID-19?

sub_task.original_text: Data on potential risks factors, Co-infections (determine whether co-existing respiratory/viral infections make the virus more transmissible or virulent) and other co-morbidities
questions: Is smoking a risk factor for COVID-19?
is pre-existing pulmonary disease a risk factor for COVID-19?
Does co-morbidities make COVID-19 more transmissible or virulent

questions: Are Neonates more potential for COVID-19?
Are pregnant women more potential for COVID-19?

sub_task.original_text: Data on potential risks factors, Socio-economic and behavioral factors to understand the economic impact of the virus and whether there were differences
questions: What are Socio-economic factors and economic impact of COVID-19?

What are the differences of Socio-economic and behavioral factors for COVID-19?

sub_task.original_text: Transmission dynamics of the virus, including the basic reproductive number, incubation period, serial interval, modes of transmission and environmental factors
questions: What do we know about the transmission dynamics of the COVID-19?
What is the basic reproductive number of COVID-19?
What is the incubation period of COVID-19?
What is the serial interval  of COVID-19?
What are the modes of transmission of COVID-19?
What are the environmental factors of COVID-19?

sub_task.original_text: Severity of disease, including risk of fatality among symptomatic hospitalized patients, and high-risk patient groups
questions: What do we know about Severity of COVID-19?
What is risk of fatality among symptomatic hospitalized COVID-19 patients?
What is risk of fatality among high-risk COVID-19 patient groups?

sub_task.original_text: Public health mitigation measures that could be effective for control
questions: What are public health mitigation measures effective for controlling COVID-19?
